diff_hunk:
@@ -716,6 +716,9 @@
 - name: soft_margin_loss_forward(Tensor self, Tensor target, bool size_average, bool reduce)
   self: soft_margin_loss_backward(grad, self, target, size_average, reduce)
 
+- name: relu(Tensor self)
body:
Good point. That's interesting:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5652049/37303162-fc977aec-2603-11e8-92c4-c1efd2194cba.png)
(threshold on left, clamp_min on right (as cmaxValue))

I don't think the conditional should slow down the code by as much as you're seeing but... that can be an investigation for another day
